original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes weaker at 302.25/80, bond yields up
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed weaker at 302.25/80 to the US dollar on Friday, after opening at 300.70/95, dealers said, while bond yields were up.
A bond maturing on 15.06.2029 closed at 13.70/80 percent. (Colombo/Sep13/2024)
